page.title: 03BOUNDARY FARM, BIRKDALE
page.content: Boundary farm is located off Turning Lane,Scarsbrick in an area of very flat land. It is a mixed farm which means the farmer earns his income from animals and the growing of crops. The farm is owned by Mr. Fairclough and his two brothers and covers 140 acres. To enable him to run the farm well it is essential that he buys good seed, fertiliser, insecticides and some animal food each year. FIELDS AND DRAINAGE. Originally there were 30 fields but as modern machinery was developed it became cheaper to cultivate large fields.Today many field boundaries have been removed to make 15 large fields.
